title: Gradle Impl executor
description: The Gradle Impl executor is used to run Gradle tasks.

taskName.description: The name of the Gradle task to run.

testClassName.description: The full test name to run for test task (package name and class name).

args.description: The arguments to pass to the Gradle task.

excludeDependsOn.description: If true, the tasks will not execute its dependsOn tasks (e.g. pass --exclude-task args to gradle command). If false, the task will execute its dependsOn tasks.

includeDependsOnTasks.description: List of Gradle task paths that should be included (not excluded) even when excludeDependsOn is true. These are typically provider-based dependencies that Gradle must resolve.

__unparsed__.description: Additional arguments to pass to the gradle command (automatically populated by Nx).
